full_output.summary: As a passionate and dedicated coding enthusiast, I leverage my proficiency in Python, C, and C++ to tackle complex problems. With a solid foundation in Data Structures and Algorithms and with my exceptional problem-solving and interpersonal skills, I am actively seeking roles in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Robotics, and Automation fields, where I can apply my skills to drive innovation.

projects.name: Intelligent Traffic Flow Prediction Model
projects.description: Developed/Implemented/Tested a traffic flow prediction framework called "The Intelligent Traffic Prediction with Dijkstra and LSTM System" to find the best routes. The system generates adjacency matrices from several network graphs of roads and then applies Dijkstra's algorithm to the resulting matrix.

projects.name: Solar Powered Servo-Driven IOT Based Hydroponics Vertical Tower Garden
projects.description: Built a Tower Garden, a vertical hydroponic system leveraging IoT technology, equipped with solar panels and omnidirectional wheels to provide a time-efficient and cost-effective alternative to conventional gardening.

projects.name: Automatic License Plate Detection using Neural Networks
projects.description: Created a learning model to make predictions in Jupyter Notebook.

projects.name: Brain Tumor Detection using Neural Network
projects.description: Prepared image datasets for training/testing to create a learning model to detect whether a patient has a tumor in Jupyter Notebook.

projects.name: Transformative Quadruped
projects.description: Studied/Designed quadruped capable of switching between two locomotion i.e., rolling and walking in TinkerCAD.
